channel.title: customers on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in customers on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-21
item.description: First details leak on Project Iris, Google’s next AR headset (3 minute read) Google is developing a new augmented reality headset that it plans to ship sometime in 2024.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-15
item.description: Tesla starts deploying Starlink satellite internet systems at Supercharger stations (2 minute read) Tesla has started to deploy Starlink antennas at its Supercharger stations.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-09
item.description: Reddit to reportedly tokenize karma points and onboard 500M new users (2 minute read) Reddit is planning to convert its users' karma points into Ethereum-based tokens.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-25
item.description: Apple’s new M1 Max MacBook Pro may get a virtual turbo button for High Power Mode (2 minute read) The upcoming macOS Monterey will feature a High Power Mode in the new 16-inch M1 Max MacBook Pros.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-04
item.description: Coinbase Multi-Factor Authentication Hack Affects at Least 6,000 Customers (1 minute read) Between March and May this year, hackers used a flaw in Coinbase’s account recovery process to bypass SMS multi-factor authentication and transfer funds out of at least 6,000 customers' accounts.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-09
item.description: Amazon’s cashierless tech is coming to Whole Foods next year (2 minute read) Amazon will bring its Just Walk Out technology to two new Whole Foods locations next year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-18
item.description: Amazon Fresh grocery store in Los Angeles opens to the public (1 minute read) Amazon Fresh at Woodland Hills, Los Angeles is now open to the public from 7 AM to 10 PM PT daily.
